titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush Hudson Limbaugh, Sr. United States Courthouse".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S386-387)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
1/10/2007--Introduced.
Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush Hudson Limbaugh, Sr. United States Courthouse."
